Changelog.FirstRunMessage: This beta is meant to test out the metro UI.
Changelog.JustUpdatedMessage: 1. Create playlists 2. New buttery animations 3. Two new mp3 providers 4. Better audio matching algorithm 5. Now playing bar has track progress 6. Get artwork, bio and similar in artist page 7. Optimize match engine for remixes, covers, etc 8. Minor UI tweaks 9. Improve player and database code 10. Update SQLite and other SDKs
